answers.answer: do they have an infection?  my daughter pees all the time and there is nothign wrong with her.  Could mean infection or just nothing

Is it a lot each time, or just a little? What is the age and general health of the child. Could be just a small bladder if this has always been the case, but if this is something new, it could be diabetes.

question: what is the disorder if a child usually experience frequent urination
title: Frequent Urination abdominal pain
